Action.author: rickr
Action.body: >>>>>>>>>>>>>{color}* throw new TransactionException(format("Bad newest block expected status 200 got %d, Chain %s", status.getStatusValue(), name)); } else { if (deliver.length < 2) { throw new TransactionException(format("newest block for channel %s fetch bad deliver missing genesis block only got %d:", name, deliver.length)); } else { DeliverResponse blockresp = deliver 1 ; newestBlock = blockresp.getBlock(); } } } >

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: I just moved this to medimum priority because I found the error in my code. :) But I'm leaving it open because I do think we need better message returned and logged on the orderer !

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Could you take a look at the improved logging, and close this if it meets your needs?

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: ~jyellick It's an improvement and I'll close but in the long run it'll be you providing support so more importantly _does it meet your needs_ ? :)
